original: @214b # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @214b # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: bha ga wa ti aushn'i shi bi dza ya sto tra /
analyzed: bha ga wa ti aushn'i shi bi dza ya sto tra /
translated: Bhagavatyoṣṇīṣavijayastotra

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: bcom ldan 'das ma gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma la bstod pa /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma la bstod pa /
translated: Praise to the Victorious Uṣṇīṣa Bhagavatī

original: mgon po 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: mgon po 'jam pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the protector Mañjughoṣa!

original: gtso mo bcom ldan 'das ma ni /
analyzed: gtso mo bcom ldan 'das ma ni /
translated: The principal Bhagavatī

original: punda r'i ka'i me tog ltar //
analyzed: punda r'i ka'i me tog ltar //
translated: Is like a puṇḍarīka flower,

original: skyon gyis ma gos sku mdog dkar //
analyzed: skyon gyis ma gos sku mdog dkar //
translated: Her body white, untainted by faults,

original: zhal gsum phyag brgyad spyan gsum mnga' //
analyzed: zhal gsum phyag brgyad spyan gsum mnga' //
translated: With three faces, eight arms, and three eyes.

original: dbu rgyan mgul rgyan snyan char bcas //
analyzed: dbu rgyan mgul rgyan snyan char bcas //
translated: She has a crown, necklace, and earrings,

original: rin chen sna tshogs mdzes pas brgyan //
analyzed: rin chen sna tshogs mdzes pas brgyan //
translated: Adorned with various beautiful jewels,

original: padma zla ba'i @215a * //
analyzed: padma zla ba'i @215a * //
translated: Seated on a lotus and moon

original: gdan la bzhugs //
analyzed: gdan la bzhugs //
translated: Seat.

original: dbus dkar g-yas ser g-yon zhal sdo //
analyzed: dbus dkar g-yas ser g-yon zhal sdo //
translated: The central face is white, the right yellow, and the left face is red,

original: khro mo'i cha lugs mche ba gtsigs //
analyzed: khro mo'i cha lugs mche ba gtsigs //
translated: With a wrathful demeanor, baring her fangs.🔽Her right hands hold a vajra cross and an arrow

original: phyag g-yas sna tshogs rdo rje dang // bad steng rgyal ba 'od dpag med //
analyzed: phyag g-yas sna tshogs rdo rje dang // bad steng rgyal ba 'od dpag med //
translated: On a lotus, with the Victor Amitābha,

original: mda' dang mchog sbyin phyag rgya'o //
analyzed: mda' dang mchog sbyin phyag rgya'o //
translated: Making the mudrā of generosity.

original: g-yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags ba dang ; / gzhu dang mi 'jigs phyag rgya dang // bum pa dag ni legs par bsnams //
analyzed: g-yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags ba dang ; / gzhu dang mi 'jigs phyag rgya dang // bum pa dag ni legs par bsnams //
translated: a bow, the gesture of fearlessness, and a vase.

original: rnam par snang mdzad dbu brgyan cing //
analyzed: rnam par snang mdzad dbu brgyan cing //
translated: She is crowned with Vairocana.

original: 'od zer dkar po 'phro zhing 'du //
analyzed: 'od zer dkar po 'phro zhing 'du //
translated: White light radiates and is reabsorbed.

original: stod g-yogs lha yin bza' can //
analyzed: stod g-yogs lha yin bza' can //
translated: She wears a divine upper garment.

original: blo dang tshe 'phel mdzad ba mo //
analyzed: blo dang tshe 'phel mdzad ba mo //
translated: She increases intelligence and life.

original: pu ri'i nang du mdzes par bzhugs //
analyzed: pu ri'i nang du mdzes par bzhugs //
translated: She sits beautifully in the center of a lotus.

original: bcom ldan 'das ma nyid la bstod //
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das ma nyid la bstod //
translated: I praise the Blessed Lady herself.

original: g-yas na rje btsun spyan ras gzigs //
analyzed: g-yas na rje btsun spyan ras gzigs //
translated: To her right is the venerable Avalokiteśvara,

original: sku mdog dkar po skyon ma gos //
analyzed: sku mdog dkar po skyon ma gos //
translated: white in color, immaculate.

original: g-yon na bad bsnams g-yas pa na //
analyzed: g-yon na bad bsnams g-yas pa na //
translated: To his left he holds a lotus, and in his right hand

original: rnga yab 'dzin la bdag phyag 'tshal //
analyzed: rnga yab 'dzin la bdag phyag 'tshal //
translated: he holds a fly whisk. I pay homage to him.

original: g-yon gyi gsang ba'i bdag bo ni //
analyzed: g-yon gyi gsang ba'i bdag bo ni //
translated: To his left is the Lord of Secrets,

original: autpal mdog 'dra rdo rje g-yon //
analyzed: autpal mdog 'dra rdo rje g-yon //
translated: blue like a lotus, with a vajra in his left hand,

original: g-yas pa rnga yab mdzes 'dzin pa //
analyzed: g-yas pa rnga yab mdzes 'dzin pa //
translated: and holding a beautiful fly whisk in his right hand.

original: mthu stobs can la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: mthu stobs can la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: I pay homage to the powerful one.

original: shar lho nub byang phyogs bzhi yi //
analyzed: shar lho nub byang phyogs bzhi yi //
translated: In the four directions of east, south, west, and north

original: khro bo'i rgyal po bzhi po ni //
analyzed: khro bo'i rgyal po bzhi po ni //
translated: are the four wrathful kings.

original: mdun na khro rgyal mi g-yo ba //
analyzed: mdun na khro rgyal mi g-yo ba //
translated: In front is the wrathful king Acala,

original: sngo bsangs g-yas na ral gri 'dzin //🔽g-yon na sdigs mdzub skra brdzes pa //
analyzed: sngo bsangs g-yas na ral gri 'dzin // g-yon na sdigs mdzub skra brdzes pa //
translated: On the left, a threatening forefinger.🔽Hair disheveled,

original: sbrul rgyan stag gi sham thabs can //
analyzed: sbrul rgyan stag gi sham thabs can //
translated: adorned with snakes, wearing a tiger-skin skirt,

original: padma nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs //
analyzed: padma nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs //
translated: seated on a lotus-sun seat.

original: ma rungs 'dul la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: ma rungs 'dul la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the one who tames the wicked.

original: khro chen 'dod pa'i rgyal po ni //🔽sngo bsangs lcags kyu 'bar ba bsnams //
analyzed: khro chen 'dod pa'i rgyal po ni // sngo bsangs lcags kyu 'bar ba bsnams //
translated: The great wrathful one, King of Desire,🔽blue, holding a blazing hook,

original: ma rungs 'dul ba'i rgyan cha can //
analyzed: ma rungs 'dul ba'i rgyan cha can //
translated: adorned with the trappings of taming the wicked.

original: thams cad 'gugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
analyzed: thams cad 'gugs la phyag 'tshal lo //
translated: Homage to the one who summons all.

original: khro chen dbyug pa sngon bo ni //
analyzed: khro chen dbyug pa sngon bo ni //
translated: The great wrathful one, Nīladaṇḍa,

original: zhal gcig phyag gnyis g-yas pa na //
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag gnyis g-yas pa na //
translated: with one face and two arms,

original: dbyug to g-yon pa sdigs mdzub mdzad //
analyzed: dbyug to g-yon pa sdigs mdzub mdzad //
translated: with a club in the right hand, a threatening forefinger in the left.

original: sngo bsangs kun 'dul khyod la bstod //
analyzed: sngo bsangs kun 'dul khyod la bstod //
translated: I praise you, the blue one who subdues all.

original: khro bo'i rgyal po stobs po che //
analyzed: khro bo'i rgyal po stobs po che //
translated: The king of wrathful ones, Mahābala,

original: autpal mdog 'dra phyag gnyis pa //
analyzed: autpal mdog 'dra phyag gnyis pa //
translated: two-armed, the color of a blue lotus,

original: g-yas pa rdo rje sdigs mdzub g-yon //
analyzed: g-yas pa rdo rje sdigs mdzub g-yon //
translated: with a vajra and threatening forefinger in the right hand,

original: bdud 'dul drag po khyod la bstod //
analyzed: bdud 'dul drag po khyod la bstod //
translated: I praise you, the fierce one who tames Māra.

original: zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo //
analyzed: zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog sngo //
translated: One face, two arms, blue in color,

original: kun kyang stag dang sbrul gyis brgyan //
analyzed: kun kyang stag dang sbrul gyis brgyan //
translated: all adorned with tigers and snakes.

original: padma nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs //
analyzed: padma nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs //
translated: Seated on a lotus and sun seat.

original: bar chad zhi mdzad khyed la bstod //
analyzed: bar chad zhi mdzad khyed la bstod //
translated: I praise you, the pacifier of obstacles.

original: steng gi phyogs na mdzes pa yi //
analyzed: steng gi phyogs na mdzes pa yi //
translated: In the upper direction, the two beautiful

original: gnas gtsang lha yi bu gnyis po //
analyzed: gnas gtsang lha yi bu gnyis po //
translated: Sons of the gods of the Pure Abodes,

original: lha yi bu ni gnyis po yang //
analyzed: lha yi bu ni gnyis po yang //
translated: The two sons of the gods,

original: lha @215b yi rgyan dang na bzas mdzes //
analyzed: lha @215b yi rgyan dang na bzas mdzes //
translated: Beautiful with divine ornaments and garments,

original: phyag na bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams //
analyzed: phyag na bdud rtsi'i bum pa bsnams //
translated: Holding in their hands vases of nectar,

original: bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs kun la snyoms //
analyzed: bdud rtsi'i char 'bebs kun la snyoms //
translated: Bringing down a rain of nectar, impartial to all,

original: dag pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
analyzed: dag pa'i sku la phyag 'tshal bstod //
translated: I pay homage and praise the pure body.

original: gang zhig nangs nangs sngar langs te //🔽bstod pa 'di yis dus kun du //
analyzed: gang zhig nangs nangs sngar langs te // bstod pa 'di yis dus kun du //
translated: Whoever rises early in the morning🔽And praises with this praise at all times

original: 'khor dang bcas la bstod gyur na //
analyzed: 'khor dang bcas la bstod gyur na //
translated: To the retinue,🔽Will increase their intelligence and lifespan,

original: blo dang tshe rnams 'phel ba dang // dpal dang 'byor pa'i dngos grub ster //
analyzed: blo dang tshe rnams 'phel ba dang // dpal dang 'byor pa'i dngos grub ster //
translated: And be granted the siddhi of glory and wealth.

original: mchog gi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: mchog gi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: The supreme siddhi will be accomplished.

original: gus pa'i sems kyis sngar langs nas //
analyzed: gus pa'i sems kyis sngar langs nas //
translated: With a respectful mind, having risen early,

original: rtse gcig sems kyis bstod par bya //
analyzed: rtse gcig sems kyis bstod par bya //
translated: One should praise with a one-pointed mind.

original: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i bstod pa /
analyzed: gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ma'i bstod pa /
translated: The Praise of the Victorious Uṣṇīṣa

original: slob dpon tsandra go mi sa mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: slob dpon tsandra go mi sa mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The composition of Ācārya Candragomin is complete.
